verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Yet one <WH259> plague <WH5061> more will I bring <WH935> on Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on Egypt; <WH4714> afterwards <WH310> he will let you go. <WH7971> When he lets you go, <WH7971> he will surely <WH1644> thrust you out <WH1644> altogether. <WH3617>

Speak <WH1696> now in the ears <WH241> of the people, <WH5971> and let them ask <WH7592> every man <WH376> of his neighbor, <WH7453> and every woman <WH802> of her neighbor, <WH7468> jewels <WH3627> of silver, <WH3701> and jewels <WH3627> of gold. <WH2091>"

Yahweh <WH3068> gave <WH5414> the people <WH5971> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians. <WH4714> Moreover the man <WH376> Moses <WH4872> was very <WH3966> great <WH1419> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh <WH6547>'s servants, <WH5650> and in the sight <WH5869> of the people. <WH5971>
Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> "This is what Yahweh <WH3068> says: <WH559> <WH3915> 'About midnight I will go out <WH3318> into the midst <WH8432> of Egypt, <WH4714>

and all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall die, <WH4191> from the firstborn <WH1060> of Pharaoh <WH6547> who sits <WH3427> on his throne, <WH3678> even to the firstborn <WH1060> of the female servant who is behind <WH310> the mill; <WH7347> and all the firstborn of livestock. <WH1060>
There shall be <WH1961> a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> such as there has not been, <WH3808> nor <WH3808> shall be any more. <WH3254>

But against any of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> a dog <WH3611> won't <WH2782> even bark or move its tongue, <WH3956> against man <WH376> or animal; <WH929> that you may know <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> makes a distinction <WH6395> between the Egyptians <WH4714> and Israel. <WH3478>

All these your servants <WH5650> shall come down <WH3381> to me, <WH3381> and bow down themselves to me, <WH559> saying, "Get out, <WH3318> with all the people <WH5971> who follow <WH7272> you; <WH310>" and after that I will go out. <WH3318>'" He went out <WH3318> from Pharaoh <WH6547> in hot <WH2750> anger. <WH639>
Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Pharaoh <WH6547> won't <WH8085> listen to you, <WH4159> that my wonders may be multiplied <WH7235> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>"

Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did <WH6213> all these wonders <WH4159> before <WH6440> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and Yahweh <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh <WH6547>'s heart, <WH3820> and he didn't <WH1121> let the children of Israel <WH3478> go out <WH7971> of his land. <WH776>
